client.secure_account_description: Multi-layer authentication and secure infrastructure keep your information protected.
client.priority_service_description: Get early access to new collections, exclusive designs, and limited edition engraved gifts.

hero.title: Premium engraved gifts crafted to keep
hero.subtitle: Laser-sharp engraving on glass, wood, metal, and leather with gift-ready packaging. Fast turnaround for milestones, corporate gifts, and everyday wins.

collections.heading: Shop by collection
collections.empty: Create collections to feature them here.

featured.title: Featured personalised gifts
featured.subtitle: Best sellers and new arrivals, ready to engrave.
featured.empty: No products yet. Add products in the admin to showcase them here.

bundles.title: Value bundles & engraving sets
bundles.subtitle: Curated combos ready to engrave and gift.

story.title: Gift-ready quality with thoughtful engraving
story.subtitle: We personalize fast, package beautifully, and ship with care so your gifts arrive ready to impress.

fast.title: Fast engraving & dispatch
fast.copy: Personalized and out the door quickly, even for last-minute gifting.

materials.title: Premium materials
materials.copy: Quality woods, metals, and finishes that feel premium in hand.

packaging.title: Gift-ready packaging
packaging.copy: Arrives beautifully boxed with care instructions and notes.

trust.title: Trusted by customers
trust.copy: Reviews from real recipients; see what people love most.

cta.title: Let’s craft the perfect gift together
cta.subtitle: Need advice on sets, engraving, or shipping times? We’re here.

collections.title: Collections
collections.subtitle: Curated drops like Gifts for Men, Wedding Keepsakes, and bespoke engraved sets.

empty.title: No collections yet
empty.body: Create a collection in Admin -> Collections and it will appear here automatically.

footer.description: Premium engraving and personalized gifts crafted to keep. From corporate awards to milestone keepsakes, we engrave with precision and deliver gift-ready.

cart.title: Shopping Cart
cart.subtitle: Review your items and proceed to checkout
cart.empty_message: Looks like you haven't added anything to your cart yet. Start shopping to fill it up!

address.phone_hint: Format: +1 (country code) followed by phone number
address.us_only: Currently shipping to US addresses only

checkout.review_subtitle: Please verify your order details before proceeding to payment
checkout.no_addresses_message: Please add a shipping address to continue
checkout.phone_hint: Format: +1 (country code) followed by phone number

payment.title: Complete Your
payment.subtitle: Enter your payment details to complete your order
payment.card_secure_message: Your payment information is secure and encrypted

banner.title: We use cookies for a better engraving experience
banner.body: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content and offers.

settings.title: Cookie Settings
settings.body: Manage your cookie preferences. Some cookies are essential for the site to function and cannot be disabled.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.body: Required for security, checkout, and access to protected areas.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.body: Help us understand how visitors interact with our site (anonymous performance data).

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.body: Used to personalize offers and measure campaign performance.

preferences.title: Preference Cookies
preferences.body: Remember language, region, and theme preferences.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we protect your data while crafting your engraved gifts
privacy.intro: Your trust matters. We collect only what we need to personalize and fulfill your engraved orders, and we keep it secure.

data.heading: Data we collect
data.copy: We collect contact details, shipping information, and order history to fulfill and support your engraving purchases.

items.account: Account details (name, email, phone) to manage your profile and support requests.
items.orders: Order and shipping details for engraving, personalization, and delivery.
items.analytics: Anonymous analytics to improve our catalog and site experience.

cookies.heading: Cookies
cookies.copy: We use essential cookies for security and checkout, plus optional analytics/marketing. You can manage them in the cookie banner.

security.heading: Security
security.copy: We use encrypted connections, role-based access, and limited retention to safeguard your information.

contact.heading: Questions
contact.copy: If you have privacy questions or data requests, contact our team.

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.subtitle: Our approach to cookies for a smooth engraving experience
cookiePolicy.intro: We use cookies to keep your cart, remember preferences, and improve our engraving storefront.

what.heading: What are cookies?
what.copy: Small text files stored on your device that help the site function, stay secure, and remember your preferences.

types.heading: Types of cookies we use
types.essential: Essential: security, authentication, cart, and checkout.
types.analytics: Analytics: anonymous usage to improve products and navigation.
types.marketing: Marketing: personalize offers and measure campaigns.
types.preferences: Preferences: remember language, region, and display settings.

control.heading: How to control cookies
control.copy: Use the banner controls on our site, your browser settings, or clear cookies. Essential cookies are required for checkout.

contact.heading: Contact
contact.copy: For cookie questions, reach out to our privacy team.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: The rules for shopping engraved gifts with us
terms.intro: By using this site or placing an order, you agree to these terms. They ensure we can craft, personalize, and deliver your engraved items reliably.

use.heading: Use of the site
use.copy: You agree to provide accurate information, respect intellectual property, and not misuse the site. Accounts are for your personal use; keep your login secure.

orders.heading: Orders, engraving, and payment
orders.copy: Personalized orders begin production after payment. Proofs are produced only when stated. Prices and availability may change. Taxes and shipping are shown at checkout. You authorize us to engrave text or artwork you provide.

returns.heading: Returns and cancellations
returns.copy: Engraved or personalized items are final sale except for defects or errors on our part. Report issues within 7 days of delivery with photos so we can remake or refund when appropriate.

contact.heading: Need help?
contact.copy: For questions about these terms or your order, contact our support team.

hero.title: Browse all products
hero.subtitle: Shop engraved pieces ready to personalize.

empty.title: No products found
empty.message: Try removing filters or check back soon.

section.subtitle: Select a product to see details and personalization options.
